unit.utterance: Yek āqāyi bud ke bā nardebān nardebān gozāšte bud az nardebān rafte bud bālā
unit.utterance_translation: There was a man on a ladder, he climbed up the ladder

unit.utterance: ke mixāst mivehāyi ke tane deraxt dāšt rā bekanad
unit.utterance_translation: in order to pick the pears on the tree

unit.utterance: bad yek pārčeye sefidi ham ke gardanaš andāxte bud
unit.utterance_translation: and there was a white scarf around his neck

unit.utterance: ke masalan mivehā rā ke mikand mirixt ān tu
unit.utterance_translation: in order to keep the pears in it

unit.utterance: bad miyāmad pāyin yek zanbil, čand tā zanbil ham ānjā bud ke dāxele ān zanbilhā xāliaš mikard
unit.utterance_translation: then he climbs down the tree and puts them into one of the baskets

unit.utterance: bad az baqale ān āqā ham yek āqāyi āmade bud ke bā olāqaš dāšt rad mišod
unit.utterance_translation: then another man passes him by with a donkey

unit.utterance: bad az ān ham yek pesari āmad bā dočarxe ke yeki az ān zanbilhā rā gozāštaš ruye dočarxeaš ke mixāst az piše ān āqā bebarad be jāyi bebarad
unit.utterance_translation: afterwards a little boy came on his bike and took one of the bakets in order to carry to somewhere

unit.utterance: bad in āqāyi ke ruye nardebān bud dobāre hamin amal rā hey tekrar mikard miraft dobāre bālāye deraxt bāz golābihā rā mikand mirixt tuye hamān pārčeyi ke dore gardanaš bud
unit.utterance_translation: the man on the tree climbs up over and over again to pick the pears, puts them in his scarf

unit.utterance: bad in pesare ham ke dāšt rad mišod yek āqāyi bāhāš barxord mikone
unit.utterance_translation: the little boy on his way runs into someone

unit.utterance: ke zamin mixorad bad harče ham tuye zanbil golābi bud hame mirizad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: he falls down and the pears spill out

unit.utterance: bad čand tā az pesarhā ke az hamān jā dāštand rad mišodand āmadand komakaš kardand golābihā rā jam kardand dāxele zanbil rixtand
unit.utterance_translation: some boys who were passing came to help him gather up the pears and put them back in the basket

unit.utterance: bad dobāre bāz in pesare savāre dočarxe šod az pišešān rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: the boy got on his bike and pass them by

unit.utterance: bad zāheran kolāhaš ke ruye zamin oftāde bud beyne ān se tā pesarhā yekišān sut mizanad
unit.utterance_translation: his hat was left on the ground, one of the boys whistled

unit.utterance: ke ān pesare barmigardad miistad ke mibinad kolāhaš rā az ruye zamin bardāštand dārand mibarand samtaš
unit.utterance_translation: the boy turns back, stops and sees them took his hat and are bringing back for him

unit.utterance: ke mibarand beheš midahand bad in kolāhaš rā migozārad ke dārad rad mišavad bad in se tā pesarhā ham az jāyi dārand rad mišavand
unit.utterance_translation: they give him his hat, he puts it on and goes away, the three boys are also passing by the place where

unit.utterance: az piše hamān āqāyi hast ke bālāye deraxte dārand rad mišavand rad mišavand ke bad ān āqā miāyad pāyin haminjur be ānhā negāh mikonad ke in film ham tamām mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: the gardner was picking the pears, they are passing, at the same time the man climbs down the tree and looks at them and the film comes to an end
